languages.text: {n}Маражай издает странный звук — не то кашель, не то смешок.{/n} "Твой язык подводит тебя. Мне показалось, что ты... пытаешься избавиться от меня?"
{n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издает странный звук — не то кашель, не то смешок.{/n} "Твой язык подводит тебя. Мне показалось, что ты... пытаешься избавиться от меня?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suelta un ruido a medio camino entre la tos y la risa.{/n} «Imagino que ha sido un desliz, ¿verdad? Porque casi parece que quieras librarte de mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suelta un ruido a medio camino entre la tos y la risa.{/n} «Imagino que ha sido un desliz, ¿verdad? Porque casi parece que quieras librarte de mí».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了古怪的声音，听起来既像是咳嗽，又像是在笑。{/n}“你是口误了吧？听起来就好像你打算甩掉我一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了古怪的声音，听起来既像是咳嗽，又像是在笑。{/n}“你是口误了吧？听起来就好像你打算甩掉我一样。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは半分咳き込み、半分笑いながら奇妙な声を上げた。{/n}「それは失言というやつだな。俺を排除しようとしているように聞こえるぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは半分咳き込み、半分笑いながら奇妙な声を上げた。{/n}「それは失言というやつだな。俺を排除しようとしているように聞こえるぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un bruit étrange, à mi-chemin entre le rire et la toux.{/n} « Un lapsus malencontreux, je présume ? Pour un peu, on croirait presque que vous cherchez à vous débarrasser de moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un bruit étrange, à mi-chemin entre le rire et la toux.{/n} « Un lapsus malencontreux, je présume ? Pour un peu, on croirait presque que vous cherchez à vous débarrasser de moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai stößt ein Geräusch aus, das halb Husten, halb Lachen ist.{/n} "Gewiss nur ein Versprecher? Es klingt fast, als würdet Ihr versuchen, mich loszuwerden."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, öksürme ile gülme arası bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Dilin falan sürçtü herhâlde? Beni istemiyormuşsun gibi bir şey anladım da..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a strange half-cough, half-laugh.{/n} "A slip of the tongue, surely? It almost sounds as though you are attempting to get rid of me."
